entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Vauxhall
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:34 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vauxhall AAFC 2:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: -5.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -9.2°C
Wind: SE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow at times heavy beginning this evening. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h this evening then northeast 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow early in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 25. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023
